definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: LBS. minimum pull-out force in direction indicated.
sentences.chinese: 标示出至少7磅的外拉力及其方向。

sentences.english: Equipment nameplates will be bilingual, English and French.
sentences.chinese: 设备标示牌要采用英法双语表示。

sentences.english: An abandoned military road, overgrown with weeds, marked the former boundary line.
sentences.chinese: 一条长满野草的废弃军用公路标示出以前的边界线。

sentences.english: In the US, warning messages have been in place on cigarette packages for decades.
sentences.chinese: 在香烟盒上标示警告语的做法在美国已有几十年了。

sentences.english: His name was carded upon two rooms.
sentences.chinese: 有两个房间用卡片标示着他的名字。

sentences.english: On the edges are 13 inlaid jade markers.
sentences.chinese: 外侧镶嵌有13个标示音位的玉徽或金徽。

sentences.english: Eid-al-Fitr marks the end of Muslim fasting month of Ramadan.
sentences.chinese: 开斋节标示著穆斯林斋戒月的结束。

sentences.english: Use highlighters (colored pens) with texts to highlight forms that you are studying.
sentences.chinese: 用荧光笔在你读的书上标示出这些形式。

sentences.english: Power sockets for benches will be shown in the relative plan view.
sentences.chinese: 工作台上的电源插座在相关侧面图上标示。

sentences.english: Black lines designate boundaries on this map.
sentences.chinese: 在这幅地图上黑线标示疆界。

sentences.english: In the past, numbers in the financial records of a company were written in red ink to show a loss.
sentences.chinese: 过去，公司财务记录数字都用红色墨水标示亏损。

sentences.english: All dimensions may be inaccurate and are subject to adjustments.
sentences.chinese: 所有标示的尺寸，或会有所调整，不可作准。

sentences.english: All these mark the boom of "Qu" as an esthetic category of classical Chinese literary criticism.
sentences.chinese: 这标示出了“趣”作为我国古代文论审美范畴的盛兴。

sentences.english: The captain plotted out the ship's course and told the crew to get ready.
sentences.chinese: 船长标示出船的航线并让船员们做好准备。

sentences.english: Bulk containers must be properly placarded and marked.
sentences.chinese: 装货集装箱一定要适当地被公告而且标示。

definition: to mark out/to tag/to put a sign on sth explaining or calling attention to/to annotate (e.g. a character with its pinyin)
variant of 標誌|标志[biao1 zhi4]
model or template character/written slogan or phrase/mention (e.g. "air mail" 航空 on a letter, "first draft" 初稿 on a document etc)
(technical) manual/(book of) directions/synopsis (of a play or film)/specification (patent)/CL:本[ben3]
to stake out (the boundaries of a property etc)/to demarcate/(engineering etc) to calibrate
